attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mobility Component of the Disability 
living Allowance should be given to to 
 people over 65 years of age who Qualify
 for the above. Not to do so amounts to Age Discrimination.

rejection.details: The title of your petition must be a request for an action, not simply your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
